full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Sering Name: Phase Two - EZ897 - 241978 – Airport LTF Decommissioning – Watson Lake, Yukon

**Reference Number:** WS4588178036-Doc4653116965

This is a Preliminary Notice, not an Invitation to Bid. The period for submitting the ROM (Preliminary Estimates) By each shortlisted bidding firm is now closed.

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS4588178036
* **Publication Date:** 2024-06-25
* **Tender Closing Date:** 
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-09-03 to 2024-10-15 (approximate dates)

## Contract Summary
### Description of the nature and scope of work 
The work involves the decommissioning of the former Trail Field Final Treatment (LTF) beneath the apron at Watson Lake Airport.

## Detailed Bid Solicious Requirements

* **Bidding method**: The bidding will be competitive and discretionary. Suppliers must demonstrate they can perform the project work, materials requirements, and personnel qualifications set forth in the funded arrangement (formerly SR Date Aug. 17 2024).
* **Time of submission**: Only qualified suppliers as determined at the completion RM4 Evaluation ROM will be invited to bid. Each remain is asked these selected short listing to submit RFP within 45 days from the date implied in the introduced publication from the last ROM modified input matrix attempt next at the Fusion publisher).
